post:
LawlNet are kicking off the new year with a bang! For January only we're doubling disk space on all of our budget VMWare VPS offerings. Located in the Colo@ Atlanta datacentre, with a great mix of upstream providers to deliver your content quickly across the US and internationally.

The plans available at the LEB price range are as follows:

**128MB Plan**:

1 vCPU core @ 2.50GHz
128MB vRAM allocation
50GB (was 25GB) RAID10 HDD 
800GB Bandwidth
1000Mbps Network Port

$4 per month. 24-72 hours manual set up time.

<a href="http://www.lawlnet.com/ce/order.php?step=1&productGroup=10&product=24">Order Here</a>

**256MB Plan**:

2 vCPU cores @ 2.50GHz
256MB vRAM allocation
80GB (was 40GB) RAID10 HDD 
1000GB Bandwidth
1000Mbps Network Port

$6 per month. 24-72 hours manual set up time.

<a href="http://www.lawlnet.com/ce/order.php?step=1&productGroup=10&product=25">Order Here</a>

**512MB Plan**:

4 vCPU cores @ 2.50GHz
512MB vRAM allocation
120GB (was 60GB) RAID10 HDD 
2000GB Bandwidth
1000Mbps Network Port

$7 per month with promo code "LOWENDTALK". 24-72 hours manual set up time.

<a href="http://www.lawlnet.com/ce/order.php?step=1&productGroup=10&product=26">Order Here</a>

Our nodes are powered with the latest Intel processors, 24GB RAM, and a RAID-10 HDD storage setup. A lightning fast SSD setup is used for the hyper-visor OS. Each VPS is set at 1000Mbps. These servers will handle any kind of burst in traffic your server receives. 

Our systems allow almost any operating system to be installed. However, on hand we are capable of pre-installing your server with: CentOS, Ubuntu, Oracle Solaris, CloudLinux*, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows Server 2008 R2, and Windows Server 2012.

vSphere is available for an extra $1 per month.

**Test files + IP**:

<a href="http://www.lawlnet.com/speedtest/100MB.LAWLNET">100MB</a>
<a href="http://www.lawlnet.com/speedtest/1000MB.LAWLNET">1000MB</a>

IP: 199.116.118.215

AUP TL;DR:

No warez, IRC can be used but will be suspended if we get a complaint from an upstream provider, Legal Torrents, No Cracked O/S, No DoS, No Adult or Spam.
